name.baseName: Aluminum electrolytic capacitor production ; Capacitors, auxiliaries and energy use ; Aging and inspection ; Capacitors, auxiliaries and energy use
铝电解电容器生产 ; 电容器，辅助剂和能源使用 ; 老化和检查 ; 电容器，辅助剂和能源使用

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 老化和检查 ; 铝电解电容器（AEC）生产 ; 420V 680uf

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The investigated manufacturer produced about 1.183 billion AECs of all kinds in 2020.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical application for the described Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitor (AEC) production caters to the manufacturing of capacitors rated at 420V 680uf, suitable for various electronic devices that require energy storage and filtering functions. These devices may include consumer electronics, industrial machinery, automotive electronics, and power supplies. The production process is specifically aimed at meeting the massive demand, as indicated by the 1.183 billion units produced by the investigated manufacturer in 2020.
所描述的铝电解电容器（AEC）生产适用于制造额定电压420V、电容量680uf的电容器，这些电容器适用于需要储能和滤波功能的各种电子设备，包括消费类电子、工业机械、汽车电子和电源供应。特定的生产过程旨在满足庞大的需求，如2020年调查的制造商生产的11.83亿个单位所示。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data of capacitor production come from the AECs’ production factory in Jiangsu Province, China. The cut-off criteria of LCI data collection for each process is coverage of at least 95% of the mass and energy of the input and output flows. The inventory data of anode foil production and cathode foil production is obtained based on the analysis of the manufacturing processes and corresponding process parameters. The upstream data (i.e., aluminum ingots, separator paper, transport, electricity, and water) are acquired from the Gabi software (Version: 10.6.1.35). In detail, the profile of Chineses electricity grid from the China Electric Power Yearbook adopts the reference year 2016. The reference year of aluminum ingot production is 2015. The inaccessible data about ammonium citrate, ammonium pentaborate, NH4H2PO4, and HBO3 are estimated based on chemical equations using the existing materials (reactants) in the Gabi software. The use and end-of-life stage inventory data are obtained based on analysis and calculation.

电容器生产的库存数据来自 AEC 位于中国江苏省的生产工厂。每道工序的 LCI 数据收集的截止标准是至少覆盖输入流和输出流 95% 的质量和能量。阳极箔生产和阴极箔生产的库存数据是根据生产工艺和相应工艺参数分析获得的。上游数据（即铝锭、分选纸、运输、电力和水）来自 Gabi 软件（版本：10.6.1.35）。具体而言，《中国电力年鉴》中的中国电网概况以 2016 年为基准年。铝锭生产的基准年为 2015 年。无法获取的柠檬酸铵、五硼酸铵、NH4H2PO4 和 HBO3 数据是根据 Gabi 软件中现有材料（反应物）的化学方程式估算的。使用和报废阶段的库存数据是通过分析和计算获得的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).
Zhang, C., Jing, J., Yun, L., Zheng, Y. & Huang, H. A cradle-to-grave life cycle assessment of high-voltage aluminum electrolytic capacitors in China. J. Clean. Prod. 370, (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the dataset for life cycle assessment, ensure that the inventory data for AEC production represents the geographical and technological context accurately by matching the processes with those in Jiangsu Province, China. Note the reference years for aluminum ingot production (2015) and the profile of the Chinese electricity grid (2016). Consider the cut-off criteria for the data collection of input and output flows, ensuring at least 95% coverage of mass and energy. Upstream data is sourced from the Gabi software; therefore, confirm software version compatibility (v10.6.1.35) for consistency. Modeling of the use phase and the end-of-life stage should incorporate specific factory-based analyses and calculations. For unavailable data such as certain chemicals, use estimates based on chemical equations with reactants from the Gabi software, acknowledging these as modeled and not primary data.

在使用数据集进行生命周期评估时，请确保AEC生产的清单数据准确地代表了地理和技术环境，通过将过程与中国江苏省的相匹配。注意铝锭生产（2015年）和中国电网概况（2016年）的参考年份。考虑输入和输出流数据收集的截止标准，确保至少覆盖95％的质量和能量。上游数据来自Gabi软件，因此确认软件版本兼容性（v10.6.1.35），以保证一致性。使用阶段和生命周期末期的建模应纳入特定工厂的分析和计算。对于一些不可获取的数据，如某些化学品，使用基于Gabi软件中的反应物的化学方程式进行估算，并将其视为模拟数据而非原始数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
